controller

Class CardGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CardGame

  • public class CardGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the game itself, with methods to manipulate the state of the game.

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame()
        Starts a new game. Effectively shuffles the deck of cards, and deals them to the standard piles, and puts the rest to the stock.
